title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1375/89 of 19 May 1989 fixing the indicative ceiling for imports into Spain of certain seed potatoes for the period 1 October to 31 December 1989
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1375/89  of 19 May 1989  fixing the indicative ceiling for imports into Spain of certain seed potatoes for the period 1 October to 31 December 1989
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The indicative ceiling for imports into Spain of certified seed potatoes covered by CN code 0701 10 00 shall be 26 726 tonnes for the period 1 October to 31 December 1989.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 October 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 May 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 55, 1. 3. 1986, p. 106.
(2) OJ No L 293, 27. 10. 1988, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 60, 1. 3. 1986, p. 58.
(4) OJ No L 151, 17. 6. 1988, p. 33.
